main_definition: A period at the end of a week, typically Saturday and Sunday, when work or school is not in session.

meanings_and_examples.example: I can't wait for Friday to come so that I can have the weekend to relax.
The farmer looks forward to his weekends, where he takes a break from working on his fields and animals.
On the weekend, I like to go hiking in the nearby national park.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Opportunity to spend time with family and friends
meanings_and_examples.example: We usually plan a barbecue party every Saturday afternoon as it's our favorite way to spend weekends together.
